mapper.insert: insert into board (seq, id, name, email, subject, content, ref) values (seq_board.nextVal, #{id}, #{name}, #{email}, #{subject}, #{content}, seq_board.currVal)
mapper.select: select count(*) as count from board
select count(*) from board where ${searchOp} like '%'||#{searchVal}||'%'
select * from (select rownum rn, temp.* from (select * from board where ${searchOp} like '%'||#{searchVal}||'%' order by ref desc, step asc) temp) where rn between #{startNum} and #{endNum}
